text: The 2014 Italian Athletics Championships () was the 104th edition of the Italian Athletics Championships and were held in Rovereto from 18 to 20 July 2014. ==Champions== {| class="wikitable" width=70% style="font-size:90%; text- align:center;" |- !Event !!Men !!Performance !!Women !!Performance |- |100 m||align=left|Delmas Obou ||10.33 (+0.7)||align=left|Irene Siragusa ||11.51 (-1.2) |- |200 m||align=left|Diego Marani ||20.47 (+0.1)||align=left|Irene Siragusa ||23.27 (-1.4) |- |400 m||align=left|Matteo Galvan ||45.58||align=left|Libania Grenot ||50.55 |- |800 m||align=left|Giordano Benedetti ||1:49.09||align=left|Marta Milani ||2:05.01 |- |1500 m||align=left|Mohad Abdikadar Sheik ||3:46.63||align=left|Federica Del Buono ||4:10.26 |- |5000 m||align=left|Marouan Razine ||14:13.88||align=left|Giulia Viola ||15:55.98 |- |3000 m steeplechase||align=left|Patrick Nasti ||8:42.91||align=left|Valeria Roffino ||9:53.82 |- |110/100 m hurdles||align=left|Hassane Fofana ||13.60 (+1.4)||align=left|Marzia Caravelli ||13.07 (+0.0) |- |400 m hurdles||align=left|Leonardo Capotosti ||50.17||align=left|Yadisleidy Pedroso ||55.84 |- |High jump||align=left|Gianmarco Tamberi ||2.22||align=left|Alessia Trost ||1.90 |- |Pole vault||align=left|Giorgio Piantella ||5.40||align=left|Roberta Bruni ||4.30 |- |Long jump||align=left|Emanuele Catania ||7.98 (+1.3)||align=left|Tania Vicenzino ||6.51 (+1.0) |- |Triple jump||align=left|Fabrizio Schembri ||16.61 (-0.1)||align=left|Dariya Derkach ||13.10 (-0.6) |- |Shot put||align=left|Daniele Secci ||18.55||align=left|Chiara Rosa ||17.21 |- |Discus throw||align=left|Hannes Kirchler ||62.73||align=left|Valentina Aniballi ||55.54 |- |Hammer throw||align=left|Nicola Vizzoni ||75.99||align=left|Micaela Mariani ||66.24 |- |Javelin throw||align=left|Norbert Bonvecchio ||78.96||align=left|Sara Jemai ||53.85 |- |10 km walk road||align=left|Giorgio Rubino ||40:13:00||align=left|Antonella Palmisano ||45:15:00 |- |4X100 relay||align=left|G.A.
